info.name: WSO2 Identity Server - Identity Provider Management API definition
info.description:
This document specifies a **Identity Provider Management RESTful API** for **WSO2 Identity Server**


Contact Support:
 Name: WSO2
 Email: architecture@wso2.com

item.name: identity-providers
meta
federated-authenticators
Metadata about supported federated authenticators of identity providers

request.description: This API provides the list of supported federated authenticators for an identity provider in Identity Server

item.name: Metadata about a supported federated authenticator

request.description: 'This API provides the details of a single supported federated authenticator for an identity provider in Identity Server'

item.name: outbound-provisioning-connectors
Metadata about supported outbound provisioning connectors by identity providers in Identity Server

request.description: This API provides the list of supported federated authenticators for an IDP in Identity Server

item.name: Metadata about supported outbound provisioning connectors

request.description: This API provides the details of a single supported outbound provisioning connectors for an IDP in Identity Server

item.name: {identity-provider-id}
federated-authenticators
{federated-authenticator-id}
Retrive federated authenticator config of an identity provider

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrive the federated authenticator information of an identity provider by giving the federated authenticator id

item.name: Update a federated authenticator of an identity provider by using authenticator id

request.description: This API provides the capability to update an identity provider's federated authenticator config by specifying authenticator id

header.description: Location of the updated federated authenticator

item.name: Federated authenticators of an identity provider

request.description: This API provides a list of federated authenticators enabled for a specific identity provider identified by its id

item.name: provisioning
outbound-connectors
{outbound-provisioning-connector-id}
Retrive outbount provisioning connector of an identity provider

variable.description: Id of the outbound provisioning connector

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrive the outbount provisioning connector information of an identity provider by specifying provisioning connector id

item.name: Update an outbound provisioning connector of an identity provider

variable.description: Id of the outbound provisioning connector

request.description: This API provides the capability to update an outbound provisioning connector config of an identity provider by specifying the provisioning connector id

header.description: Location of the updated outbound provisioning connector

item.name: Outbound provisioning connectors of an identity provider

request.description: This API provides a list of outbound provisioning connectors enabled for an identity provider

item.name: jit
Just-In-Time provisioning config of an identity provider

request.description: This API retrives the Just-In-Time provisioning config of an identity provider by specifying identity provider id

item.name: Update the just-in-time provisioning config of an identity provider

request.description: This API provides the capability to update the just-in-time provisioning config of an identity provider by specifying identity provider id. This includes the ability to enable/disable JIT provisioning, change provisioning userstore and enable/disable user prompts for username, password and consent

header.description: Location of the updated just-in-time provisioning config

item.name: Provisioning entities of an identity provider

request.description: 'This API provides a list of available provisioning entities of an identity provider. This includes just-in-time provisioning config and outbound provisioning connectors'

item.name: claims
Claim config of an identity provider

request.description: This API provides the claim config for an identity provider. This includes idp-to-local claim mappings, claims to be outbound provisioning, userID claim URI and role claim URI

item.name: Update the claims of an identity provider

request.description: This API provides the capability to update the claim config of an existing identity provider

header.description: Location of the updated claim config

item.name: roles
Role config of an identity provider

request.description: This API provides the role config of an identity provider. This includes idp-to-local role mappings and/or a list of roles to be outbound-provisioned

item.name: Update the role config of an identity provider

request.description: This API provides the capability to update the role config of an identity provider by specifying identity provider id

header.description: Location of the updated role config

item.name: Retrive identity provider by identity provider's id

request.description: 'This API provides the capability to retrive the identity provider details by using its id. Furthermore, by specifying the "Accept : application/xml" header, it provides the ability to export IDP data as XML'

item.name: Patch an identity provider property by id. Patch is supported only for key-value pairs

request.description: This API provides the capability to update an identity provider property using patch request. IDP patch is supported only for key-value pairs

header.description: Location of the updated identity provider

item.name: Delete an identity provider by using identity provider's id

query.description: Enforce the forceful deletetion of either an identity provider, federated authenticator or an outbound provisioning connector eventhough it is being reffered by a service provider

request.description: This API provides the capability to delete an identity provider by giving it id

item.name: Connected applications of an identity provider

request.description: This API provides the list of applications which are using this identity provider for federated/provisioning.

item.name: templates
{template-id}
Retrieve identity provider template by id

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve an indentity provider template using it's id.

response.name: Successful response

item.name: Update the IDP template of a given template id.

request.description: This API provides the capability to update the IDP template of a given template id.

item.name: Delete a IDP template using the template Id.

request.description: This API provides the capability to delete a IDP template using the template Id.

item.name: List identity provider templates

request.description: This API provides the list of available identity provider templates.

response.name: Successful response

item.name: Create a new IDP template

request.description: This API provides the capability to create a new IDP template.

header.description: Location of the newly created identity provider template

item.name: List identity providers

query.description: Maximum number of records to return
Number of records to skip for pagination

Condition to filter the retrival of records. Supports 'sw', 'co', 'ew' and 'eq' operations and also complex queries with 'and' operations. E.g. /identity-providers?filter=name+sw+"google"+and+isEnabled+eq+"true"

Define the order in which the retrieved records should be sorted
_This parameter is not supported yet_

Attribute by which the retrieved records should be sorted
_This parameter is not supported yet_

Specifies the required parameters in the response
_This parameter is not supported yet_

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrive the list of identity providers

item.name: Add a new Identity Provider

request.description: This API provides the capability to create a new Identity Provider

header.description: Location of the newly created identity provider
